title: Angular Portfolio
description: I created this website to practice using Angular. I built a custom service to handle the loading of JSON files. I used Observables,AsyncPipe and NgFor to create custom cards from the JSON data. I used Angular Material for the navbar, the skills page and for some other components. Also this is fully responsive in both portrait and landscape mode.

title: React Portfolio
description: I first designed this with Figma, then i made it from scratch with CSS, JS and React. I used Vite to easily preview the mobile version. I made everything on my own exept for the toolbar that i took from Bootstrap.

title: JBubbleBobble
shortDescription: A reimagining of Bubble Bobble written in Java.
description: I developed this game for a university exam, following the MVC pattern with Java. I'm currently working on an improved version without the academic limitations.

title: Bloggie - ASP.NET MVC
shortDescription: Blog created following an ASP.NET MVC tutorial on Udemy.
description: Blog created following an ASP.NET MVC tutorial on Udemy. With this project i had the chance to improve my skills on DbContext, Authorization, the ASP.NET MVC and more.

title: PowerBI Reports
shortDescription: A couple of reports created with Power BI during the Data Analyst course at Epicode.
description: One report presents data on employment in Italy, and another is designed to manage a predefined business model. I had the opportunity to practice data collection from multiple sources and to create charts and layout the report using Power BI.
